metadata.title: Summary of Oshoro Maru Cruises in the Eastern Bering Sea

creators.name: Hokkaido University - Laboratory of Physical Oceanography, Faculty of Fisheries

metadata.description: The T/S Oshoro Maru has made a research and training cruise to the North Pacific Ocean and Bering Sea every summer since 1953.  Oceanographic observations, biological sampling of plankton and fishes and other measurements have been carried out by the research staff, captain and officers with the assistance of the crew and of cadets from the University of Hokkaido and the University of Nagasaki as part of their on-board fisheries training.
metadata.notes:
Purpose: A summary of Oshoro Maru Cruises in the Eastern Bering Sea (from 1953 to present)
